thread.section_title: CORGI HomePlan Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CORGI HomePlan | corgihomeplan.co.uk | 13 of 179
thread.title: Mr Anthony Pengelly
thread.title_full: CORGI HomePlan reviewed by Mr Anthony Pengelly

author: Mr Anthony Pengelly
title: Mr Anthony Pengelly
text:
I'm. so happy that I took out a Corgi HomePlan. The cost was very affordable. When my boiler developed a fault one quick phonecal and an engineer was asked to call. The engineer arrived quickly and found the problem. He made sure that I would be OK with a tempary fix, whilst he got the OK to carry on and to get the required part. He arrived with the part a day or two later and within a short time had my heating on. He cleaned up after himself and having one last look to see if he had left anything, he left.
I am very pleased that I took out the CorgiHomePlan and have no hesitation in recommending it. You never know when your going to need help.
